H0.text: Who was the first man sent into space, in 1961. Alan Shepard

H1.text: Who was the first man sent into space, in 1961. John Glenn

H2.text: Who was the first man sent into space, in 1961. Wernher von Braun

H3.text: Who was the first man sent into space, in 1961. Gagarin

A4.text: Yuri Alekseyevich Gagarin became the first person to journey into outer space.

A5.text: Gagarin completed one orbit of Earth on 12 April 1961.
